0.name: Travelling to Midgard
desc: "   The carriage is beginning to slow down.
Looking out through the window, pushing the curtains
aside you can see the outskirts of the city, the great
walls towering over the carriage.  The carriage is
bumping around a bit more as it slows down and dodges
other traffic.
The carriage shudders as it bounces over a hole in
the road.
"   You pull aside the heavy curtains but the
view outside is obscured by the clouds of dust
kicked up by the horses.

1.name: Travelling to Midgard
desc: "   You are in a travelling carriage.  The horses
gallop along, travelling at some speed.  There are
two windows through which you can look.  The seats
are reasonably comfortable but look well worn and
in need of replacement.
The carriage shudders as it bounces over a hole in
the road.
"   You pull aside the heavy curtains but the
view outside is obscured by the clouds of dust
kicked up by the horses.

19.name: Leaving NewHaven
desc: "   You are in a stationary carriage.  The carriage
is quite sizable and the seats appear comfortable.
The luggage has been stored under the seats and the
doors shut.  The windows are covered by heavy blue
felt cloth but they seem old and dust stained.
Your other passengers are all settled for the
long journey.
"   You are shaken from your feet as the driver
cracks the whip and the horses begin to the
pull the carriage.
"   You pull aside the heavy curtains but the
view outside is obscured by the clouds of dust
kicked up by the horses.

39.name: Arriving at NewHaven
desc: "   The carriage is beginning to slow down.
Looking out through the window, pushing the curtains
aside you can see the outskirts of the city, the great
walls towering over the carriage.  The carriage is
bumping around a bit more as it slows down and dodges
other traffic.
The carraige shudders to a halt and you are escorted
down to more solid land.
"   You pull aside the heavy curtains but the
view outside is obscured by the clouds of dust
kicked up by the horses.

40.name: Tiernan's Carriage Service - NewHaven Depot
desc: "   You are in a carriage station.  There is no ticket master but you can
see some fine carriages and their teams of horses.  Several are prepared
and waiting for departure.  While you wait you see the occassional
passenger purchase a ticket and mount a carriage.  Looking around you can
only see one exit, that to the stables.  By the looks of the tracks, all
the carriages enter and leave via the stables.
"   You jump aside as a carriage recklessly rushes through
the stables and screeches to a halt at the back of the
barn.

exits.info: door, closed, locked, pickproof, autoclose, autolock
